title: I'm petitioning for an unban
body: Okay so I made a previous post asking about my unban, After reading the comments I was wondering if I desserved the ban. The answer to that question would be no, I didn't even get a second "2 week ban", Riot went straight to perma ban. The reasoning brhind this is that I used a trigger word for both times I was banned, the trigger word was kill urself, the second time however, it was used in past tense and I was referring to a jax that inted. Please help me reach out to riot so that my ban can be at least reviewed and rejudged. I feel as if this ban was inappropriate and IF ANYTHING I should just get a reduced sentence. I will also be willing to pay for my account on top of a full reform.

replies.body:
You dont get to petition to be unbanned. Well, you can, but it wont achieve anything. Except maybe provide amusement..

Permbans are reserved for people who have proven themselves incapable of understanding warnings or correcting their behavior.
its EXPLICITELY STATED that I used the trigger words for a ban, thus this ban was unjust as it wasn't even reviewed. Illiterate ?

So.. You got banned because you knowingly and intentionally broke the rules by skipping straight to zero-tolerance language, because you decided that getting smashed by the bot instead of manually reviewed makes you *less* liable for your behavior? Also, permbans are always reviewed, but in this case it probably took one quick glance for someone to agree with the bot.

And you did it while chat-restricted for previous behavior, after being explicitly warned that further ignoring the rules would have severe consequences? With a little box that requires you to manually confirm that you understand?

What the hell sort of fucked up logic is that?

You misread what others said in your prior thread.

The standard punishment escalation in league is:

Unpunished Account
10 Game Chat Restriction
25 Game Chat Restriction
14 Day Ban
Permanent Ban
my friends acct. got 3, 14 day bans, so that definitely is false

Are you sure his statement being false is the ONLY conclusion you can draw from that? Here are two more:

1. Your friend showed good behavior after their 14-day bans and said bans was revoked.
2. Some of those bans were issued in error.
.3. A combination of 1 and a 14-day ban for gameplay offense.

Hate speech, homophobia and encouraging others to harm themselves skips 2 punishment tiers. 

If you were at 10 game chat restriction,  it will skip the 25 game chat restriction and 14-day ban, placing you at the permaban tier.
thats why i said that I used a trigger word, i.e "kill urself" but it was taken out of context, I used none of those.

However, as mentioned, it's, and I quote "a ZTP" (I have QUOTED with QUOTATION MARKS). If what you say is true, then go to riot support and file a ticket.

If what you say is true, and you *truly were* talking about a Jax that had killed himself in-game, then post your chat logs. The full ones. And we'll tell you why the ban went through.

If it was truly a mistake, Boards can't help you anyway. You would need to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to Player Support. We're here if what you want is to understand where you went wrong. Only Player Support can actually help you overturn anything. And if they tell you it wasn't a mistake, then it's *highly* unlikely that it was.
If you don't think your perma ban was just, post the chat logs that resulted in that ban. We can't take your word for it.

I could support your un-ban, but you absolutely went too far. How far you went to skip straight to a 14-day is pretty disgusting. I will support your un-ban, but if you ever flame anyone again, I'd perma-ban you, to be honest. It's SO easy to just play the game without flaming anyone. "/mute all" it's so easy to do during in-game chat. Just type this message, "Hey guys, I'm going to (input play strategy for this match) and mute you all. I'll listen to pings though." It's honestly the easiest thing to do. I do it a lot and even when I don't "/mute all"  it's easy to just focus on the game and ignore other players. You ACTUALLY have 0 reason to flame people in League. I ADMIT that I flame people a bit sometimes, because even I snap under the pressure at times, but I don't go further than a couple messages or a "Dude, what were you thinking?" You have the right to question people, but you don't have the right to belittle them.

Though, I must say, petitioning for your own un-ban will do nothing.

This was actually a dope post, however, I need chat for communication because pings aren't enough but I should've done the mute all plan. I've heard that petitioning is pointless but i need some sort of voice to back me up, that's how T1 and Jensen got unbanned
